# Vault (Room)
## Overview
**Vault**

**Create** 8 Goods, 7 Labor (300 gp); **Time** 16 days 

**Size** 4â€“8 squares 

**Upgrades From [[Reliquary (Room)|Reliquary]]**, [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]; **Upgrades To** [[Secret Room (Room)|Secret Room]] 

This is a secure room designed to keep out intruders. The access to this space is controlled by an iron door with a good lock. If you upgrade this room to a [[Secret Room (Room)|Secret Room]], the door retains its material and lock and also becomes a secret door.
